TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ValidationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class ValidationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ValidationAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 做為所有驗證屬性的基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all validation attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會強制執行驗證，根據與資料表相關聯的中繼資料。This class enforces validation, based on the metadata that is associated with the data table. 您可以覆寫這個類別來建立自訂驗證屬性。You can override this class to create custom validation attributes.

exception.span: 已當地語系化錯誤訊息的 和 屬性會在設定未當地語系化的 屬性錯誤訊息時同時設定。

span.span: The and properties for localized error message are set at the same time that the non-localized property error message is set.

related.span: 如何： 自訂資料在資料模型中使用自訂屬性的欄位驗證

span.span: How to: Customize Data Field Validation in the Data Model Using Custom Attributes

summary.span: 取得或設定錯誤訊息，此錯誤訊息會在驗證失敗時與驗證控制項產生關聯。

span.span: Gets or sets an error message to associate with a validation control if validation fails.

value.span: 與驗證控制項相關聯的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that is associated with the validation control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是與驗證控制項相關聯的錯誤訊息。This property is the error message that you associate with the validation control. 它用於非當地語系化的錯誤訊息。It is used for non-localized error messages.

summary.span: 取得當地語系化的驗證錯誤訊息。

span.span: The localized validation error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤訊息字串的取得方式評估屬性或藉由評估和屬性。The error message string is obtained by evaluating the property or by evaluating the and properties. 有兩種情況會互斥。The two cases are mutually exclusive. 如果您想要顯示當地語系化的錯誤訊息，則會使用第二個案例。The second case is used if you want to display a localized error message.

span.span: The name to include in the formatted message.

summary.span: 根據發生錯誤所在的資料欄位，將格式套用至錯誤訊息。

span.span: Applies formatting to an error message, based on the data field where the error occurred.

returns.span: 格式化之錯誤訊息的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the formatted error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會格式化錯誤訊息使用屬性。This method formats an error message by using the property. 這個方法會附加觸發要格式化的錯誤訊息的錯誤資料欄位的名稱。This method appends the name of the data field that triggered the error to the formatted error message. 您可以自訂如何藉由建立衍生的類別會覆寫此方法格式化的錯誤訊息。You can customize how the error message is formatted by creating a derived class that overrides this method.

Validates the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法來判斷是否該物件所指定`value`參數才有效。This method calls the method to determine whether the object that is specified by the `value` parameter is valid. 如果方法會傳回`false`，這個方法會呼叫方法來取得當地語系化的訊息，指出此問題。If the method returns `false`, this method calls the method to get a localized message that states the problem. 它則會擲回例外狀況。It then throws a exception.

span.span: Validation failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會驗證的物件或屬性的值屬性宣告。This method validates the value of the object or property on which the attribute is declared. 它會呼叫方法，並傳遞`value`做為參數。It calls the method and passes `value` as a parameter. 如果驗證失敗，擲回例外狀況。If validation fails, a exception is thrown.

span.span: is not valid.
